description:
Thinking of implementing big data? This course on big data ecosystem provides a brief introduction to big data ecosystem and hadoop. The instructor Durga Gadiraju, has a 12+ years of experience in IT. He has been associated with several fortune clients such as Wal-Mart, IBM, AT&T,Dell, etc.

When big data is effectively and efficiently captured, processed, and analyzed, companies are able to gain a more complete understanding of their business, customers, products, competitors, etc. which can lead to efficiency improvements, increased sales, lower costs, better customer service, and/or improved products and services.

This course covers brief introduction to big data ecosystem, hadoop ecosystem, NoSQL ecosystem, data integration and enterprise data warehouse.
title: Introduction to Big Data Analytics
